scene.name: intro
scene.line: Oh yeah, these tubes are all messed up. Look like they've been in a swamp, or a cave or something — there's moss growing on this one!
That's OK, I have a few spares in my bag here ... Here, I pulled this one out of an old computer monitor. Just needs to be recalibrated a bit ...

scene.name: tuning
scene.line: OK, that oughta ... should be seeing something now; are you seeing anything?
scene.option: Hey that looks dangerous, what you're doing there.
Uh, little bit to the left ... ?

scene.name: tuning-more
scene.line: Damn, OK ... Here, I think the contacts are dirty. Now don't go telling my customers I clean off old vacuum tubes with spit ...
There, just gotta turn it north/south, and —
